name: STOOL (FECES)
V: Constipation, painful and difficult bowel movements, dry, small in quantity
P: Diarrhea, watery stools, quick or uncontrollable evacuation, burning sensation, increased frequency, moderate amount
K: Solid, decreased frequency, large amount, containing mucus, with itching
desc: In Vata diseases, constipation and gas tend to occur along with nervousness, dryness and lack of vitality. In Pitta diseases, diarrhea is common, often with burning sensations. In Kapha conditions, mucus discharges increase, along with slower and more difficult elimination.
